titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.
Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-428, by Mr. Reynolds.

The requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII for a two-thirds vote to consider reports from the Committee on rules on the same day they are presented to the House is waived with respect to any resolution reported on the legislative day of February 26, 2004, providing for consideration or disposition of H.R. 3783, or any amendment thereto.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 148.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Waives a specified requirement of rule XIII to provide for consideration of H.R.3783 (Surface Transportation Extension Act of 2004).
